def_en: Ham is meat from the top of the back leg of a pig, specially treated so that it can be kept for a long period of time.
A ham is a person whose hobby consists of using special radio equipment to talk to other people with the same hobby, often people who are in other countries.

def_cn: 蹩脚演员;表演过火的演员
def_en: A ham actor is someone who acts badly, exaggerating every emotion and gesture.

def_cn: （常指演员故意地）表演过火，夸张做作
def_en: If actors or actresses ham it up, they exaggerate every emotion and gesture when they are acting, often deliberately because they think that the audience will be more amused.
